author: donaldp
msg: Started to reorganize package structure to be more like Cocoon and myrmidon.
This should allow more components to be added overtime without having the conceptual contortions that we had with old package hierarchy.

msg: Made it non-obligatory that Embeddors implement Parameterizable.
